fig.label: Fig. 2

caption.p: The 3D space filling model of the neuraminidase protein showing surface exposed, conserved peptide segments, here shown in different colors, on one monomer (in cyan) of the quaternary structure. All peptides can be seen in Video 2. The 3D space filling model of the neuraminidase protein showing surface exposed, conserved peptide segments, here shown in different colors, on one monomer (in cyan) of the quaternary structure. All peptides can be seen in Video 2 in the online version at https://doi.org/10.1016/B978-0-12-801238-3.10878-5.

fig.attrib: Reproduced from Ghosh, A.; Nandy, A.; Nandy, P. (2010). Computational analysis and determination of a highly conserved surface exposed segment in H5N1 avian flu and H1N1 swine flu neuraminidase. BMC Structural Biology. 10, 6, Fig. 3.
